sentence.text: tRNA wobble adenosine to inosine editing-related intellectual disability has been recently described in 24 individuals from eight Saudi families who had cognitive impairment and strabismus.

sentence.text: tRNA wobble adenosine to inosine editing-related intellectual disability is an important recognizable cause of intellectual disability in Arabia
